ygData.subject: Re: Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, runes, words, pages, etc are suppost to only be found on creatures that are 16th level or higher. I find them on high level warriors in S Ro... Found
ygData.messageBody:
Well, runes, words, pages, etc are suppost to only be found on creatures
that are 16th level or higher. I find them on high level warriors in S Ro...
Found them in Upper Guk on high level frogloks... Its just a chance that a
creature that is 16th or higher will be carring them. I don't think the type
of creature matters. The creature doesn't have to be magical either.

Once you get high enough to kill the higher level creatures you will start
finding them.

-----Original Message-----
From: Alex Cordero [mailto:gemini5719@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 10:51 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Runes


From: Alex Cordero <gemini5719@...>


Does anyone know a website where it says where to find runes or which
monsters have specific runes because i'm approaching 16 and i haven't seen a
rune in the game yet. And plz don't copy that thing that says it spawns on
magical creatures and some number or people will have runes that don't
pertain to thier class. Thanks for the assist
